Easy to wear, this dress is a plunge style over the bust ( wear with a tube top underneath for a more conservitive look- see our BASICS SECTION for some avaliable tube tops)
you can twist this top at the neck to suit your size.
The bottom part to this dress is a free size frilled sweeper with all the princess and glam you want or need.

name: Allure Breast plate
description:
This ONE OFF UNIQUE peice is a stunning addition of any simple outfit.... you can interperet this peice is so many ways.

 Wear it with a plain formal dress to make a statement at your next event, with a singlet and jeans or  DARE TO BARE , attach some hollywood tape and rock it ! great for standout fashion events

This breast plate is hand beaded and made with authentic feathers , velvet flowers and silver diamontees, it contains pearls and crystals & stunning vintage frill.
This was made for a fashion event and is a ONE OFF will not be custom made again!

this is a one size fits all item and includes postage

''be the change you want to see in the world''

name: Gypies Lace Free spirit dress
description:
This STUNNING dress was the opening number of the RAW fashion show! 
This PRETTY unique eye-catching dress, made with intricate hand made embellishment detail, uses genuine vintage retro yesteryear fabrics

With a fully lined  under skirt , the over lay is a stunning hemmed lace.
attached in the centre with a big adorable bow to match the colour of choice, sewn on  to stay put.
This dress is so beautiuful and there will never be another like it!
The sleeves are fun and frilly and very elegant.

This dress has a fully supported bust that acts as a moulded bralet however if you choose to wear a strapless bra you still can!
 thats the greatness of IN FAIR VERONA its practicle comfortable realistic unbelievable beautiful all year round! 

FEATURES: handmade rosettes your choice of colours.
* stunning delicate lace skirt with a built in underskirt
* easy on the eye and extreamly comfortable to look great yet party on after with ease.
* absoloutley beautiful!

SIZE: this dress will be made in your size and colour

THIS DRESS- is handmade by Jess Johnson with vintage and new fabrics, Each design is a complete ONE OFF so carry the story forward
keeps you looking perfectly unique!

name: The Mary -Kate Sweeper Maxi
description:
This stunning Design handpicked by the beautiuful MARY-KATE FITZPATRICK of California USA.

Miss Fitzpatrick selected this dress to wear in THE MISS USA PADGENT 2011  and wore it again IN 2012 to the MISS HISPANIDAD PADGENT, Not to mention outtings with the likes of celebraties including PARIS HILTON!

This has fast become a best selling  in  USA by Jessica Johnson of IN FAIR VERONA DESIGNS so now its avaliable to be custom made just for you. 
A stunning cotton silk voile in a feminine floral with a semi stretch to it  encases the bust in a signiture plunge style. 
you will be emailed avaliable florals to choose from.

The centre boasts a one off trinket detail and the back a string of fine pearls to lace the back.

The beautiful skirt is fully frilled with in a free flow form, elastic waist for easy fitting abilities .
Get you own MARY-KATE SWEEPER now~  

TO ORDER - please answer these questions after you have placed order and send to beusii@live.com
* YOUR BUST AND USUAL DRESS SIZE
* YOUR PREF TONE OF COLOUR FLORAL ( pink purple , blue ect)
* DO YOU WANT YOUR HIGH LOW HEM TO BE AS PICTURED, SHORTER OR LONGER

name: Lady of Memories Lane Sweeper Maxi
description:
This feature maxi dress was the closing design for The IN FAIR VERONA  RAW 2012 fashion show presented by Raw Artist all the way from usa!

This maxi dress is amazing and puts the dazzle in BEdazzled!
It has handmade pure silk rosettes that have been handbeaded with swarovski crystals and glass pearls in each rosette that glisten and gleem.

The sweeper has a large hem frill vintage treasure style and an elastic easy fit waist.
The bust is a lined champagne coffee satin with a semi stretch to the fabric.
It is an AMAZING one off feature piece by designer jess johnson.

FEATURES: handmade silk rosettes with swarovski crystals or freshwater pearls
* high low style sweeper that is ever so elegant!
* Perfect plunge fall, that compliments

TO ORDER- please answer the following questions and email to beusii@live.com
* WHAT COLOUR ARE YOU AFTER ( some suggestions are  musk and bronze as pictured, baby pink , white and silver, Blue and  silver looks great purple and gunmetal grey) - i can do any colour you wish
* WHAT IS YOUR BUST AND DRESS SIZE
* DO YOU WANT TO SHOW A LITTLE LEG OR ALOT
* WOULD YOU LIKE CRYSTALS OR PEARLS

name: Lady Divinity Crochet Maxi
description:
This amazing dress WILL BE MADE CUSTOM JUST FOR YOU. 

Fabrics are all sourced from english/ australian HAND CROCHET made in cotton crochet with stunning embroderies and or details,

The dress was made to treasure  yesteryear vintage crochet, re-made and moulded to make a stunning maxi dress for the princess within.

This maxi contains a in build bandeau bust for full bust support and comfort ( allowing a bra if you wish)  also consists of a seperate mini skirt ( or maxi skirt)  to wear underneath the sheer  crochet dress.

Straps upon request or if the crochet is a heavy style will be hand beaded with swarovski crystals and freshwater pearl.

Embellished with all handmade and beaded broaches and treasure galore,flowers ect many differnt styles avaliable - please request - otherwise simple style as pictured will be made with centre unique detail

Choose a simple embellishment or a collector style bust
This dress is IN FAIR VERONA BEST SELLING STYLE and usually sells out fast in boutiques and online. 
Avaliable in a range of colours.

Each is a complete one off depending on the fabrics and crochet avaliable at that time
Contact will be made after order regarding colour and theme
TO ORDER
you need to answer these questions
* ARE YOU AFTER BIEGE OR WHITE OR COLOUR CROCHET
* ARE YOU AFTER A SPLIT AT THE SIDE as pictured or joined at back style
* WHAT IS YOUR DRESS SIZE/ BUST SIZE
* WHAT IS THE OCCASSION
* STRAPS / NO STRAPS
email this to beusii@live.com upon order placement and you will be contacted.

name: Gypsy Stories Sweeper Maxi
description:
You will adore and be adored in this one off sweeper dress.
A signiture and exclusive style to In fair verona, this dress puts the LOVE in LOVE IT! 

Stunning open size free skirt with a pretty frilled hem ,  fully closed or gapped sides avaliable - comfortable bandeau detail that will fit all bust sizes.

The free floating skirt with friled hem makes this dress, or is it the hand crochet genuine vintage embellishments/ hand made and beaded cameo broach on the bust??? 
Authentic freshwater pearl and swarovski details insets

This beautiuful one off will be made in your chosen colour and size

Can be made in most colours- avaliable colours will be emailed upon order

TO CUSTOM ANSWER THESE QUESTIONS in order notes
* What is your size bust and clothing approx
* Do you want a closed in back or gapped sides open back
* what colour are you after ( many avaliable)
*do you want the front- short, medium or long ( do you want to show leg or not)
